name: gatsby-transformer-screenshot
description: Gatsby transformer plugin that uses AWS Lambda to take screenshots of websites

scripts.build-lambda-package: npm run prepare-lambda-package && cp chrome/headless_shell.tar.gz lambda-dist && cd lambda-dist && zip -rq ../lambda-package.zip .
scripts.prepare-lambda-package: babel lambda --out-dir lambda-dist && cp lambda/package.json lambda-dist/package.json && cd lambda-dist && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=1 npm install --production

author: David Beckley <beckl.ds@gmail.com>
